Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Glenwood
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Leland
ShortDescription: Southbound 49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Leland, Wilson and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Leland.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
